Machine.title: Machine
Machine.description: Represents a piece of equipment in the fleet.

tenantId.description: The UID of the user who owns this machine.

name.description: The name or identifier of the machine.

type.description: The type of machine (e.g., Chargeuse, Dumper).

positions.description: An array of tire position codes (e.g., '1L', '1R').

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the machine was created.

UserProfile.title: User Profile
UserProfile.description: Represents a user's profile in the system.

role.description: The user's role in the system.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the user profile was created.

/machines/{machineId}.description: Stores information about individual machines in the fleet.
